challenge.title: Test if a Value is a String
challenge.description:
As a reminder, this project is being built upon the following starter project on Gitpod, or cloned from GitHub.

isString or isNotString asserts that the actual value is a string.
challenge.instructions: Within tests/1_unit-tests.js under the test labeled #13 in the Strings suite, change each assert to either assert.isString or assert.isNotString to make the test pass (should evaluate to true). Do not alter the arguments passed to the asserts.

tests.text: You should choose the correct method for the first assertion - isString vs. isNotString.
You should choose the correct method for the second assertion - isString vs. isNotString.
You should choose the correct method for the third assertion - isString vs. isNotString.
